ca.concordia.soen6441.d20.attribute

Class DamageBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.soen6441.d20.attribute.DamageBonus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILevelUp

    public class DamageBonus
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILevelUp
    This class represents damage bonus that character gets from his combats. When character's attack succeeds, it deals damage. The type of weapon used determines the amount of damage.
